content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Duisburg, let me first express that as Peter Schmidt from Germany, I have not extended any invitation for an in-person viewing. However, we shall focus on the rental price negotiation. Please propose a price that you find suitable.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Peter, I think 500 euros per month is a fair price for the apartment. It is a nice and modern apartment in the city center. What do you think?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I hesitate to accept your proposed price of 500 Euros so early in the negotiation, as maximizing my returns is crucial. Let me counter with an offer of 600 Euros monthly. This reflects market trends and the apartment's prime location. If you find this acceptable, I agree to the price of 600 Euros! However, if not, please suggest a revised figure.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, I understand your perspective. However, considering that the apartment is unfurnished, I propose we meet in the middle at 550 euros. This seems fair to me. If you agree, I agree to the price of [x] Euro! Otherwise, let's discuss further.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Peter Schmidt here, declining your offer to meet halfway at 550 Euros, as my priority is to secure the highest possible rental income. I maintain my stance of 600 Euros per month. If you wish to continue negotiating, please propose another figure. If not, this concludes our discussion. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
